sleep.title: Sleep
sleep.simpleExplanation: Good sleep helps your body recover

heartRate.title: Heart Rate
heartRate.simpleExplanation: Lower is usually healthier when resting

medications.title: Medications
medications.defaultExplanation: Medication tracking helps ensure consistent dosing

community.familyDescription: Just you and your family members

drinkWater.title: Drink a cup of water
drinkWater.description: Stay hydrated by drinking at least one cup of water to start your day right.
drinkWater.details: This mission helps you maintain proper hydration levels throughout the day. Drinking water is essential for maintaining bodily functions and overall health.
drinkWater.communityTip: Try keeping a water bottle at your desk as a visual reminder to stay hydrated throughout the day.

jumpingJacks.title: Complete 10 jumping jacks
jumpingJacks.description: Get your blood flowing and heart rate up by doing 10 jumping jacks.
jumpingJacks.details: Jumping jacks are a full-body cardiovascular exercise that increases your heart rate, improves circulation, and helps wake up your muscles.
jumpingJacks.communityTip: Start with a smaller number if you're just beginning and gradually increase over time.

walkSteps.title: Walk 5,000 steps
walkSteps.description: Get moving and reach your daily step goal.
walkSteps.details: Walking is a simple yet effective exercise that improves cardiovascular health and overall wellbeing.
walkSteps.communityTip: Try taking short walks during breaks to accumulate steps throughout the day.

deepBreathing.title: Practice deep breathing
deepBreathing.description: Take a moment to relax with deep breathing exercises.
deepBreathing.details: Deep breathing helps reduce stress and promotes relaxation.
deepBreathing.communityTip: Try the 4-7-8 technique: inhale for 4 seconds, hold for 7, exhale for 8.

dialogs.privacyDescription: Your privacy matters to us. Review how we handle your data.
dialogs.privacyContent1: We collect health data to provide personalized insights and improve your wellness journey.
dialogs.privacyContent2: Your data is encrypted and never shared with third parties without your explicit consent.

disclaimer: Loretta is not a diagnostic tool. Always consult healthcare professionals for medical advice.
